attributes.action: Name a street in Camp hill, Nuneaton after Robbie Hanlon
attributes.additional_details: This petition is to name one of the new streets in Camp Hill's Blue bell development after Robbie Hanlon. A well respected and loved figure of the comunity who as helped alot with developing sports initiatives and helping local sports clubs by volunteering his time. a true Nuneaton Legend!

rejection.details: This is a matter for the local authority.
